fuseLength.description: The range for the random amount of time the fuse will be lit before exploding, a negative value means the explosion will be immediate

power.description: The radius of the explosion in blocks and the amount of damage the explosion deals

maxResistance.description: A blocks explosion resistance will be capped at this value when an explosion occurs

fuseLit.description: If true, the fuse is already lit when this component is added to the entity

causesFire.description: If true, blocks in the explosion radius will be set on fire

breaks_blocks.description: If true, the explosion will destroy blocks in the explosion radius

fireAffectedByGriefing.description: If true, whether the explosion causes fire is affected by the mob griefing game rule

destroyAffectedByGriefing.description: If true, whether the explosion breaks blocks is affected by the mob griefing game rule
